ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3 pound) boneless pork shoulder (Boston Butt) roast
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 cup barbeque sauce, or to taste

cookingTips: Trim excess fat from pork shoulder before cooking
Shred meat while warm for easier texture
Add barbecue sauce in the last 30 minutes to prevent burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What makes great pulled pork and how can I layer flavors for restaurant-quality results?
